text:
At least we know actress Jennifer Lawrence will always be open and honest with us! She's just appeared in a ​podcast interview with Marc Maron and has left nothing to imagination.

Jennifer Lawrence gave a surprise review of an Oscar contender on Marc Maron's WTF podcast, and did not hold back: https://t.co/h1SZmZTTI7 — Vogue Magazine (@voguemagazine) February 26, 2018

When asked about her past romances in particular, the 27-year-old was comfortable enough to give us all the deets... Well, almost all!





She began recalling her first meeting with ex-boyfriend Darren Aronofsky for his film, Mother!.

“He flew in, pitched me, left,” Lawrence said, adding, “The whole thing was probably an hour and a half, and then I was like, ‘He’s hot.'”





“I remember I was holding my dog and I shut the door and when the door shut I went, ‘Pippy, that’s called sexual tension.’ He played hard to get for like nine months, maybe longer, which just killed me," she continued.





After confessing she was in love with him for two years, Maron then asked how the love just went away. Lawrence admitted it doesn't, revealing, “I still love him very much."

The conversation quickly turned to other ex-flames, or ones that were just rumored. The biggest and most controversial rumored romance she faced was with former co-star Chris Pratt. Many believed she was having an ​affair with him when they did the movie Passengers back in 2016.





“I never had an affair with Chris Pratt on Passengers. That’s a good one” she said, when asked about the crazy gossip she's heard about herself.





“I mean, they got a divorce like two years later and everybody was like, [shouting] ‘Jennifer Lawrence!’ And I was like, ‘What the … what, I’m in Montreal two years later,'" she concluded.

Thank you for clearing it all up, JLaw!
title: Jennifer Lawrence Says She Still Loves Darren Aronofsky and Addresses Chris Pratt Rumors
